description: Clark is attacked and wakes up in a mental asylum where the attending physician, Dr. Hudson, tells him he has been there for five years due to his elaborate fantasy that he has alien superpowers.In this new world Martha is married to Lionel Luthor, Chloe is deemed insane, and Lana chose Clark over Lex. Only one persona, another patient named John believes Clark and urges him to fight.
name: Labyrinth

description: Clark is reunited with four super powered heroes when Oliver Queen organizes the first version of the future Justice League. With Bart Allen, Arthur Curry and Victor Stone, the team works to discover what Lex Luthor is up with Project 33.1.
name: Justice
King Smurf/The Smurfs And The Howlibird
All That Glitters Isn't Smurf/Dreamy's Nightmare

description: Lex Luthor attempts to create a clone out of Superman's blood but his clone is not perfect and its mental state slowly dissolves.
name: Identity Crisis

description: Lois becomes the target of multiple murder attempts and Superman worries he may not be able to get to her in time.
name: Target

description: When Mr. Mxyzptlk comes to Metropolis to inconvenience Superman, the Man of Steel must his own tricks against him.
name: Mxyzpixilated

description: When Metallo ends up on a volcanic island with little to no memory of who he is, he meets two small children who call him Steel Man. As his memory slowly returns he becomes a threat to everybody on the island - including Lois Lane!
name: Action Figures

description: The star of the Series, Bucky O'Hare captains a lone frigate called the Righteous Indignation alongside Pilot Jenny, Gunner Deadeye Duck, Android First Class Blinky, and Engineer Bruce. What happens when their Photon Accelerator takes a hit from the Storm Toads?
name: War of the Warts

series.name: Bucky O'Hare and the Toad Wars

description: The Joker and Lex Luthor team up to take down the Dark Knight and the Man of Steel.
name: World's Finest: Part 2

description: The final battle! Superman and Batman vs Lex Luthor and Mercy vs. The Joker and Harley!
name: World's Finest: Part 3

description:
Intro:

Another one of Batmans and Robins strangest cases!

Rest of the episode:

For some reason, Superman becomes a huge jerk and starts to terrorize the world. Batman has to stop him before the steely man of tomorrow starts to do some irreversible damage!

Contains plenty of easter eggs from the Superman mythos!

Written by Steven Melching.
name: Battle of the Superheroes!

series.name: Batman: The Brave and the Bold

description: When the Daily Planet is put under a mystical spell it's up to Dr. Fate to help! But will he?
name: The Hand of Fate

description: An old enemy returns and blocks off Clark's powers, but what is his real agenda?
name: Solar Power

first_appearance_locations.name: Stryker's Island Maximum Security Internment Center

location_credits.name: Stryker's Island Maximum Security Internment Center

description: When Lois Lane is killed by Intergang, Superman decides to put an end to crime permanently. Only one person can save the world and put an end to Superman's tyranny, none other than Lois Lane.
name: Brave New Metropolis

description: A childhood pet of Lois's returns and starts causing chaos in Metropolis.
name: Monkey Fun

description: Brainiac kidnaps Lex Luthor to force him to make him a new body. Superman and Lex's bodyguard Mercy have to team-up.
name: Ghost in the Machine

description: Kalibak wants to prove he is worthy to be the son of Darkseid - how better than to murder Superman?
name: Father's Day

description: The Joker and Lex Luthor team up to take down the Dark Knight and the Man of Steel
name: World's Finest: Part 1

description: Livewire and Parasite team-up to take down Superman.
name: Double Dose

first_appearance_locations.name: Stryker's Island Maximum Security Internment Center

location_credits.name: Stryker's Island Maximum Security Internment Center

description: Bizzaro returns! Wanting to recreate the doom of Krypton no less.
name: Bizarro's World

description: When John Henry Irons creates a suit for the police squad he leaves the project believing it to be unsafe for the user, unfortunately it may be too late for it's wearer.
name: Prototype

description: When Clark Kent dies trying to clear the name of a suspected criminal, it's up to Superman set things right.
name: The Late Mr. Kent

first_appearance_locations.name: Stryker's Island Maximum Security Internment Center

location_credits.name: Stryker's Island Maximum Security Internment Center

description: Jon Irons dons the Steel suit in order to save the Man of Steel from Metallo.
name: Heavy Metal

description: Maxima comes to earth looking for Superman to be her mate unaware of the revolution going down on her home-world.
name: Warrior Queen

description: The Darkseid invasion begins!
name: Apokolips... Now!: Part I
Now You Smurf 'Em Now You Don't/Spelunking Smurf
The Smurf Who Couldn't Say No

series.name: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero

deck: Coulson and Fitz are selected for a Level 8 mission. Leaving the rest of the team to worry about the outcome
description: Dangerous secrets are being kept from Coulsons team, and he works the system to save Ward and Fitz when they are sent on a Level 8 classified mission that may end in tragedy
name: The Hub

description: Multiple enemies put pressure on Rick and the group. Could this finally be the breaking point for the survivors and the prison?
name: Internment

description: Superman loose a good friend.
name: Apokolips... Now!: Part 2

description: Superman discovers he is not the only survivor of Krypton!
name: Little Girl Lost: Part 1

description: Superman faces off against a young woman with pyrotechnic abilities who is trying to get revenge on the people who tried to manipulate her powers.
name: Where There's Smoke

description: Supergirl and Jimmy Olsen have to fight against Granny Goodness as she threatens to destroy the planet.
name: Little Girl Lost: Part 2

description: When Bruce Wayne is controlled by Brainiac, it's up to Superman and Robin to clean up Gotham City.
name: Knight Time

description: DIGGLE GOES AFTER DEADSHOT Amanda Waller (guest star Cynthia Addai-Robinson) sends A.R.G.U.S. agents to kidnap Diggle (David Ramsey). Waller informs Diggle that Lyla (guest star Audrey Marie Anderson) has gone missing after following a lead on Deadshot (guest star Michael Rowe) in Moscow. When Diggle tells the team hes headed to Russia to rescue Lyla, Oliver (Stephen Amell) and Felicity (Emily Bett Rickards) decide to join, but things get messy when Isabel (guest star Summer Glau) shows up on the tarmac and insists on joining Olivers work trip. Meanwhile, Moiras (Susanna Thompson) lawyer, Jean (guest star Teryl Rothery), tells Thea (Willa Holland) that dating Roy (Colton Haynes), a known criminal, is hurting her mothers case.
name: Keep Your Enemies Closer

description: A Critical Situation! Punk Hazard Explodes! (! , Zettai Zetsumei! Panku Hazdo Dai-bakuhatsu)
name: A Critical Situation! Punk Hazard Explodes!

description: It is the 30th Century and the everlasting villain Brainiac has found a way to travel back in time. He returns to Smallville to destroy Clark Kent before he can become Superman. Three Legionaries from the future travel back in time to help Clark fight Brainiac.
name: New Kids in Town

deck: A highly attractive model soon becomes the target for several toy-based robots that are powerful enough to challenge even Superman. Looking into this, Superman soon discovers the strange truth about Darci and her connection to Toyman who is obsessed with getting her back.
description:
A fashion show hosted by Lana Lang is underway. Clark and Jimmy are present to cover the trendy show. Lana reveals her star model: Darci Mason. While Darci flaunts her swimsuit, a strange car drives up and a cowboy, an astronaut and a knight emerge. They attack the guards and the astronaut goes after Darci. Superman arrives on the scene and destroys the knight. He then confronts the cowboy and punches its head off. However, the astronaut flies off with Darci. Superman gives chase and manages to save her.

Back at his hideout, Toyman plays with a doll which he calls Darci and vows she'll soon be all his. The cowboy arrives and gives Toyman a frock belonging to Darci. A key falls out of the pocket revealing Darci's residence.

Clark arrives at Darci's apartment and finding no one is home, he sneaks in and searches the room. The room is strangely empty of any clues of her past. He then checks the refrigerator and finds that too is empty. Darci talks to Clark for a while, but a giant toy kangaroo arrives and hurls him off the balcony. The kangaroo then goes after Darci. Superman arrives and starts fighting the kangaroo. Though the kangaroo almost escapes with Darci, Superman manages to save her and defeats the robot. Darci, however, has left and Toyman has watched the whole thing. He vows to take care of Superman.

Back at her office, Lana Lang walks in on Darci, who is busy repairing a tear in her skin. She witnesses Darci pull off the piece of skin, revealing that she is, in truth, a robot. Lana confronts Darci and Darci reveals that she is based on a doll that was popular at one point in time. The Toyman wanted a companion and built her, but she proved to have too much free will and now wants to kill him. Darci attacks Lana after she finds her employer plans to turn her over to the police. After a brief fight, a fire breaks out and Lana is trapped inside. Darci runs off, leaving Lana to burn. Once again, Superman arrives in time to save her and manages to put out the fire. Through Lana, he learns of Darci's origin and her connection to Toyman.

Darci goes to Toyman's hideout and confronts him. She tries to kill him with a gun but she finds she can't. A failsafe device prevents her from attacking him and she is forced to run. However, she is captured and Toyman decides to make some "adjustments" on her.

Shortly after Darci's entry, Superman arrives. Toyman accuses Superman of wanting Darci for himself. Though Superman assures him this is not the case, Toyman traps him in an energy cage and has him attacked by an energy being called the Death Fist Ninja. At first, Superman is nearly defeated by the ninja, but he soon figures out the ninja's moves and manages to push it into the energy cage, thereby overloading its circuits.

Toyman flees the scene with Darci but she realizes she can destroy his toys, so she destroys the helicopter both she and Toyman are riding. The helicopter crashes into the ocean. Neither Toyman nor Darci can be found.

Later, a mysterious woman waits at a train station. A conductor offers to help her with her bag, but it's too heavy for him. However, after he leaves, the woman picks up the heavy bag with ease and leaves on the train.
name: Obsession

deck: Love Hina Episode 6.
name: Keitaro's First Kiss is with...? Journey

deck: Love Hina Episode 7.
name: First Date. Keitaro's True Feelings: Nowadays

deck: Love Hina Episode 8.
name: Kendo Girl and the Legend of the Dragon Palace: Is This A Dream

deck: Love Hina Episode 9.

deck: Love Hina Episode 10.
name: Who is the Beautiful Women Wandering in the Moonlight? Transformation

deck: Love Hina Episode 11.
name: The Idol Shooting for Tokyo U is a Prep School Student: Sing

deck: Love Hina Episode 12.

name: he First Kiss Tastes Like Lemon? Marshmallow? Grown-up

name: Naru's Crush Is Now a Tokyo U Professor: Turning Into Love?

deck: Love Hina Episode 15.
name: I Love You!? Romantic Confession Inside a Cave: Tall Tale

description:
Intro:

Batman and Abraham Lincoln vs.-

...

A cyborg John Wilkes Booth?

Rest of the episode:

Bat-mite gets bored with the show, so he decides to get it cancelled, by turning it awful with his powers!

Batman and Aquaman don`t know this. They fight against Gorilla Grodd, who has a silly plan.While they do that, sudden changes (Batmobile swapped to a, for example) happen in the Brave and the bold-universe, without almost anyone noticing!

Except for Ambush bug. He tries to make the world back to the way it was (with help from Batman and Aquaman)!

He actually succeeds!

But...most viewers (and studio heads) seem to have got enough of this lighthearted vision of Batman. Darker is the way to go! So...soon, their universe will cease to exist.

Bug uses his metafictional powers (or something like that), and invites dozens of heroes and villains of the show, to have a final get-together. We don`t get to enjoy the atmosphere for long, though.

Batman gives a comforting speech to everyone present (including you).

Then the actionous theme song starts and end credits roll.
name: Mitefall!

series.name: Batman: The Brave and the Bold

deck: After the events of Thor: The Dark World the Agents of SHIELD are stuck cleaning up the mess
description: In the aftermath of the events chronicled in the feature film Marvel's "Thor: The Dark World," Coulson and the Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. pick up the pieces--one of which threatens to destroy a member of the team
name: The Well

description: The Ragin' Cajun known as Gambit, is hired by Senator Kelly to infiltrate Genosha and steal Magneto's helmet, hoping to provoke a war. But once he arrives on the island, he immediately turns himself in, much to the dismay of Scarlet Witch. All the while, Gambit begins to charm her younger sister, Polaris. Is this sincere? Or are they all pawns in HIS game?
name: Aces and Eights

deck: The origin story of the first Robin, Dick Grayson, retold.
name: A Matter of Family

deck: Inspired by a movie, Penguin believes he needs a team in order to take on Batman. He recruites Ragdoll, Firefly, Killer Croc and Killer Moth. Robin and Batgirl will have to learn to work together and Killer Moth undergoes a gruesome transformation.
name: Team Penguin

deck: Ethan Bennet is determined to better himself. Meanwhile, failed actor Basil Karlo becomes the new Clayface after stealing the mutagen that transformed Bennet. Can Batman rely on Bennet to take down Karlo?
name: Clayfaces

deck: The leads on a costumed art thief, the Everywhere Man, points towards Bruce's friend John Marlowe. Can Batman prove his innocence?
name: The Everywhere Man

deck: Hugo Strange has released a virus in Gotham, transforming its people into zombies. Can Batman and Robin find and distribute the antidote before time runs out?
name: Strange New World

deck: Black Mask get locked up at the Gotham P.D. headquarters. His man plan to break him out and activate his doomsday device. As Batman is busy tracking down the device, Batgirl and Robin will have to keep the villain contained.
name: The Breakout

deck: Mr. Freeze is terrorizing New Gotham a thousand years in the future. The only solution is to uncover the history of the legendary Batman and find his plans to stop Mr. Freeze.
name: Artifacts

deck: Daytime TV host Harleen Quinzell is fired after attacking Bruce Wayne. Joker picks up the pieces and transforms her into his new partner in crime, Harley Quinn.
name: Two of a Kind

description: Professor X and the future X-Men, along with the reprogrammed Sentinel called Rover, try to uncover information on the event that destroyed the world from Master Mold's original detention center, after learning about what caused the explosion. However, the only way to get past the other Sentinel guards is to send Rover on a suicide run to provide a distraction. However, what will happen when Marrow refuses to let them kill one of their own?
name: Rover

deck: As Batman, Robin and Batgirl go up against the thief Francis Gray, they notice something odd. Gray seems to know their every move.
name: Seconds

description: When Lana is assaulted by three drunken customers at The Talon, Clark defends her and ends up throwing the main antagonist onto the new Sheriff's car. The new uptight Smallville sheriff, Nancy Adams, arrests Clark for assault and battery but later dismisses the charges and gives Clark 40 hours of community service instead. Andrew Connors, the man that Clark threw onto the Sheriff's car, fakes a serious injury and attempts to sue the Kents. With the abrasive Sheriff Adams unwilling to help Clark and his family, Lana decides to help Clark expose Connors as a phony. Meanwhile, Helen is stalked by her ex-boyfriend, Paul Hayden. When Paul attacks and nearly kills Helen, a vengeful Lex teams up with Clark to track down Paul to the train station before he can skip town.
name: Precipice

description: When a van of Luthor Corp is hijacked by three criminals, Clark accidentally witnesses the robbery. He recognizes the leader of the gang, Eric Marsh, a baseball player of Smallville high school. Unwilling to report his suspicious to the pompous Sheriff Adams, who continues intimidating and harassing the Kents, Clark launches his own investigation and discovers that Marsh and his two friends are using refined kryptonite to use as inhalers to give them super-human strength. Meanwhile, Clark quits his job at school paper, The Torch, after discussing with Chloe about him missing a few too many deadlines. Lana sees Jennifer Small with her lawyer, and she tells Lana that she plans to divorce Henry Small. Also, Lex tries to find what cargo was stolen from his father by trying to follow Eric Marsh, while Lionel arrives in Smallville for a surprise visit to Lex, and to Chloe whom he offers her a job as an intern at the Daily Planet newspaper in Metropolis.
name: Witness

description: Lana sees the impossible: a friend named Emily Eve Dinsmore, who died six years earlier in a fatal accident at age 10, and still appears that age. Clark Kent believes Lana and searches for the truth. Emily's father Mr. Dinsmore has an accident provoked by Emily and Lionel Luthor visits him in the hospital. Lana and Clark eventually discover that Emily is the result of a Luthor Corp experiment in accelerated cloning. But problems in her chromosomes have caused her to be a flawed copy, resulting in a bad temper, with the power of super-speed and telekinesis. Meanwhile, Lex Luthor plans his wedding with Helen, while Lionel gives Lex a free airline ticket for a honeymoon in the Caribean, and to tie up some loose ends over the Emily cloning matter, and to take control of the old cave away from Lex.
name: Accelerate

description: As Clark and Lana get more romantically close to each other, the comatose Dr. Fredrick Walden recovers and repeats the sentence "the day is coming, and he will rule the world" many times. He believes that Clark Kent is a menace to mankind. He escapes from the mental institution using a strong power he has achieved and tries to eliminate Clark. Meanwhile, Dr. Helen Bryce returns to Smallville for her engagement party with Lex Luthor, and finds her office broke in and the blood sample of Clark Kent stolen. But who took the blood sample and her office files? Lionel or Lex? Clark is asked by Lex to be the best best man, and Martha and Jonathan Kent to replace his missing parents, as Clark begins hearing voices coming from his spaceship. Also, the evil Lionel Luthor continues playing mind games by trying to poison the relationship of Helen and Lex, as well as Chloe and Clark by offering her an intern job in Metropolis in exchange for her to investigate Clark. But unfortunately, Lionel overhears the revelations of Dr. Walden to Lex about Clark being an alien.
name: Calling

description: As Clark has finally begun dating Lana, Helen Bryce cancels her wedding to Lex after being told to by Lionel. But later, Helen realizes that she loves Lex and they finally get married. Meanwhile, Jonathan and Martha are thrilled to learn Martha is pregnant. The memory/spirit of Jor-El speaks to Clark via the spaceship, telling him he must leave Smallville, his parents and friends to fulfill his destiny. Clark decides to destroy the spacecraft, and the spirit of Jor-El with it, by using Lionel's kryptonite-made hexagon key that he made a copy of off the late Dr. Walden, in order to use it on the cave wall to learn the kryptonian markings. Clark, with Pete's help, steals the key and uses it to activate the spaceship, knowing the kryptonian radiation will destroy the ship. The ship does explode, but the shock wave injures Jonathan and Martha, causing her to miscarry. Chloe, jealous of Clark and Lana's blossoming romance, accepts Lionel's proposal to investigate Clark and gets the job at the Daily Planet. Clark, grief-stricken at the injury he caused his mother, puts on the red kryptonite ring and heads out of town on a motorcycle, planning never to return. Elsewhere, Lex, flying off on his honeymoon, wakes up alone on the airplane that is about to crash in the ocean...
name: Exodus
